Customizing Your Installation
Unless you're helping on the &lj; development team, you're probably running the &lj; Server for your own purposes and will want to customize its appearance, behavior, limits, and other settings to suit your needs. The following chapters cover this.
More importantly, the chapters tell you how to customize the installation in the supported way. Although you're welcome to just hack random parts up until it's working how you want it to, you'll run into trouble later when you try to stay in sync with the latest &lj; code.
By following these instructions, your life will be much easier, as all our tools assume you are doing things this way. If you end up not being able to change something, post in the &ljdevweb; community on &ljcom; and ask for help. We'll either tell you the right way to do it, or add hooks/options such that you can.
